Paragraph: Importantly , such chain Article length - dependent device performance trend is spin - coating temperature independent.

However, upon further review, it seems that "spin-coating temperature" is a process parameter and "chain Article length" may not be a material. Therefore, there may not be any valid "Material Name" entities in this paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Importantly , such chain Article length - dependent device performance trend is spin - coating temperature independent.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| chain Article length - dependent device performance trend |
| spin-coating temperature |

In this paragraph, the two "Property Value" entities are "chain Article length - dependent device performance trend" and "spin-coating temperature". These entities are mentioned as factors that can affect the performance of a device, with the first being temperature-independent and the second being a constant factor in the observed trend.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| chain Article length - dependent device performance trend |

In this revised list, the only clear "Property Value" entity is "chain Article length - dependent device performance trend". This entity refers to a material property that is dependent on the length of an article and affects the performance of a device.

The other entity mentioned in the paragraph, "spin-coating temperature", does not clearly refer to a "Value of material property". While temperature can certainly affect material properties, it is not itself a material property. Therefore, it has been excluded from the list.
